member.name: T:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushParameter
member.summary: containing the parameters used to configure an EDM Push operation. Specifying a list of objects to transfer is required; It is recommended to also set a reasonable value for "Comment" and "DisplayName".

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushParameter.Comment
member.summary: Gets or sets the comment (normally describing the reason or source of the push operation). The comment is displayed in the client status window and saved to the status database.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushParameter.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets or sets the display name. The display name is displayed in the client status window and saved to the status database.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushParameter.Objects
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of objects to transfer. The objects are specified with their FullyTypePath (e.g. Component:EDM\Test\1234). Note: All objects transferred with a single push operation must have the same ObjectServer type

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushParameter.ObjectTypesToOverwrite
member.summary: Gets or sets the object types to overwrite.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushParameter.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets the to use during the push operation.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushParameter.TemplateName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the EDM ApplicationTemplate to use.
member.value: The name of the template to use.

member.name: T:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushParameter
member.summary: Data class containing the parameters used to configure an EDM Push operation. Specifying a list of objects to transfer is required; It is recommended to also set a reasonable value for "Comment" and "DisplayName". The Settings property is initialized to contain useful default values.

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushParameter.#ctor(Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushSettings,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})

member.param: The to use during the push operation.
Display name of the push (displayed in the client status window and saved to the status database).
A comment describing the reason of push operation.
The objects to transfer (must be Server Objects and must have the same ObjectServerType).
The objects to overwrite.

member.name: T:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushSettings
member.summary: describing the Settings for an EDM Data Push Operation.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushSettings.AllowDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow the line operator to delay the push operation (only valid if RequireConfirmation is set).
member.value: true if delays are allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushSettings.AllowReject
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow the line operator to reject the push operation (only valid if RequireConfirmation is set).
member.value: true if rejections are allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushSettings.EnableLineDataConflictChecks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable the "line data conflict check" feature (See EDM documentation for details).
member.value: true if the "line data conflict check" feature is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushSettings.RequireConfirmation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the line operator confirmation must confirm the push operation (the Push is thus delayed until the line operator has confirmed / rejected the operation).
member.value: true if the line operator has to confirm the push operation; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushSettings.UseClearingPoolObjectListProtection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all objects present in the Clearing Pool are protected from overwriting when the data import is performed ("do not overwrite with master version").
member.value: true if "Clearing pool object list protection" feature is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushSettings.WaitForPredecedingPushesToComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the push operation shall wait for any other pushes to complete.
member.value: true if the push operation will wait for preceding pushes to complete; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IPushSettings.ReplaceSimilarPushes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to replace or keep similar pushes.
member.value: true if similar pushes are replaced; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushSettings
member.summary: Data class describing the Settings for an EDM Data Push Operation. A newly created instance represents the default settings.

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushSettings.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: if set to true allow the line operator to delay the push operation (only valid if bRequireConfirmation is set).
if set to true allow the line operator to reject the push operation (only valid if bRequireConfirmation is set).
if set to true enable the "line data conflict check" feature (See EDM documentation for details).
if set to true line operator confirmation is requested (and thus the Push is delayed until the line operator has confirmed / rejected the operation).
if set to true all objects present in the Clearing Pool when the import is performed will not be overwritten.
if set to true if the push operation shall wait for any other pushes to complete before.

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushSettings.DebuggerDisplayString
member.summary: Gets the debugger display string.

member.summary: Gets or sets the structure that contains extra data.
member.returns: An that contains data that is not recognized as belonging to the data contract.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow the line operator to delay the push operation (only valid if RequireConfirmation is set).

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow the line operator to reject the push operation (only valid if RequireConfirmation is set).

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable the "line data conflict check" feature (See EDM documentation for details).

member.value: true if the line operator has to confirm the push operation; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all objects present in the Clearing Pool are protected from overwriting when the data import is performed.
member.value: true if "Clearing pool object list protection" feature is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The namespace contains the service contracts of the Data Transfer API ("Push-API") for SIPLACE pro objects

member.name: T:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmDataPush
member.summary: Interface used to describe the ServiceContract of the EDM Data Transfer API for Push operations.

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmDataPush.StartDataPush(Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushParameter,System.String)
member.summary: Starts a data push with the specified parameters.
member.param: The to use.

The EDM line server to push the data to (may be specified as EDM Line Alias, SPI Line (with the "Line:" prefix) or as Hostname (with the "Host:" prefix)). Note: The EDM Line Alias must exist / The SPI Line must be assigned to a EDM Line Server / the Host must correspond to an EDM Line Alias in the EDM Machine Configuration.
member.returns: The ID Token of the push operation (used in status queries or to cancel the operation)

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmDataPush.StartMultiLineDataPush(Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushParameter,System.String[])
member.summary: Starts a data push and transfers the same data to multiple lines (this has the advantage the the data is only exported once, which reduces the performance consumption on the EDM-Master server and ensures that the same data is pushed to all line servers).
member.param: The to use.

The EDM line servers to push the data to (may be specified as EDM Line Alias, SPI Line (with the "Line:" prefix) or as Hostname (with the "Host:" prefix)). Note: The EDM Line Alias must exist / the SPI Line must be assigned to a EDM Line Server / the Host must correspond to an EDM Line Alias in the EDM Machine Configuration for all specified line servers.
member.returns: A List of ID Token of the push operations corresponding to the specified Line Servers (used in status queries or to cancel the operation)

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmDataPush.GetCurrentStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Query the the current status of a Push Operation.
member.param: The Id-Token (obtained from the Start(MultiLIne)DataPush-Call.
member.returns: A PushStatusInformation object containing the current status

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmDataPush.CancelDataTransfer(System.String)
member.summary: Cancels a push operation.
member.param: The Id-Token (obtained from the Start(MultiLIne)DataPush-Call.
member.returns: True, if the operation was canceled, false otherwise

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmDataPush.GetEdmVersion
member.summary: Gets the EDM version used by the API Server.
member.returns: An EdmVersionData containing the version information

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmDataPush.GetTemplateList
member.summary: Get information of all EDM ApplicationTemplates currently known at the server.
member.returns: A TemplateInfo object for each known template.

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmDataPush.GetEdmLineServersForSpiLine(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the all EDM line servers that is associated with the specified SPI Line.
member.param: The SPI line path.
if set to true also return line servers that are assigned to the special line [ALL].
member.returns: A list of all EDM line servers that is associated with the specified SPI Line.

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmDataPush.GetDefaultSettingsFromConfig
member.summary: Yields push settings according the current configuration on the EDM Master computer (which hosts the endpoint).
member.returns: A PushSettings object which may be used to configure subsequent data pushes

member.name: T:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmPushStatusCallback
member.summary: Callback interface for status updates from the EDM DataTransfer (Push) web Service.

member.name: M:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.IEdmPushStatusCallback.StatusUpdated(Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatusInformation)
member.summary: Called if the status of a push operation is updated.
member.param: An object containing the current status of the push operation.

member.name: T:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus
member.summary: Enumeration of all known states of the EDM Data Push Operation.

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Unknown
member.summary: Status is unknown (default)

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Custom
member.summary: Indicates a custom value (which is found in the StatusText)

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Initiated
member.summary: The operation has been initialed

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Acknowledged
member.summary: The operation has been acknowledged by the line server

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Successful
member.summary: The operation was performed successfully

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Processing
member.summary: The operation is being processed by the line server

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Failed
member.summary: The operation has failed

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Expired
member.summary: The data has expired

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.WaitingForUserInput
member.summary: The operation is waiting for user input

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Accepted
member.summary: The operation has been accepted by the user

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Delayed
member.summary: The operation has been delayed by the user

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Rejected
member.summary: The operation has be rejected by the user

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Interrupted
member.summary: The operation was interrupted unexpectedly

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Recovered
member.summary: The operation was recovered from temporary storage

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Outdated
member.summary: The item is no longer valid and will be replaced

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Canceled
member.summary: The item has been (explicitly) canceled.

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.Waiting
member.summary: The item is currently waiting for some condition

member.name: F:Asm.As.EDM.API.DataTransfer.PushStatus.TimedOut
member.summary: The item has reached a timeout
